name: Caldwell et al. v. The same Defendant

parties: Caldwell et al. v. The same Defendant.

opinions.text:
The opinion of the court was delivered by
Thompson, J. —
The affidavit of defence in this case is not essentially variant from that considered by this court in the case of Mark Sterling v. The Mercantile Insurance Co. of Philadelphia; and for the reasons there given, this judgment must be affirmed.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Thompson, J. —

casebody.head_matter: Caldwell et al. v. The same Defendant.
